graph_title: 개발협력사업 공여자가 개발도상국 주도 성과체계 및 기획수단을 사용하는 정도-수혜자별
indicator_name: 개발협력사업 공여자가 개도국 주도 성과체계 및 기획수단을 사용하는 정도
target_name: 빈곤퇴치와 지속가능발전을 위한 정책을 수립하고 이행하는데 있어 각국의 정책적 재량과 리더십 존중

en.title: Extent of use of country-owned results frameworks and planning tools by providers of development cooperation
en.graph_title: Extent of use of country-owned results frameworks and planning tools by providers of development cooperation - data by recipient
en.indicator_name: Extent of use of country-owned results frameworks and planning tools by providers of development cooperation
en.target: Respect each country’s policy space and leadership to establish and implement policies for poverty eradication and sustainable development
en.national_indicator_description: This indicator measures the extent to which, and the ways in which, all concerned development partners  use country-led results frameworks (CRFs) to plan development cooperation efforts and assess their performance.
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 468kB)
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
